descriptions:
Introducing the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths, the perfect addition to your holiday decorations! This set includes 1 lighted Christmas wreath adorned with pine cones and red berries, 2 Christmas garlands with enchanting LED lights, 2 festive red Christmas bows, and 1 sturdy metal hanger. 

Crafted with high-quality PE synthetic fir, these wreaths are not only durable but also beautifully realistic. The warm yellow LED lights create a cozy and inviting ambiance, making your home feel warm and welcoming during the festive season. 

With a garland size of 106 inches in length and 10 inches in diameter, each garland boasts an impressive 315 branch tips, ensuring a lush and full appearance. The 17.72-inch diameter of the Christmas wreath adds a stunning focal point to any space. The red bows, measuring 23.6 x 13.8 inches, bring elegance and charm to your holiday decor.

Powered by batteries, these wreaths and garlands can be placed anywhere without the need for an outlet, providing you with the freedom to decorate your front door, fireplace, Christmas tree, mantel, porch, cabinets, and shelves effortlessly. 

Ideal for both homes and commercial spaces such as shops and hotels, these poinsettia Christmas wreaths are perfect for living rooms and Christmas parties. Transform your space into a winter wonderland with the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths. Get yours now and make this holiday season truly magical!

Introducing the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths! Get ready to transform your home into a winter wonderland with this stunning set. 

Inside this set, you will find 1 lighted Christmas wreath adorned with pine cones and red berries, 2 Christmas garlands with beautiful LED lights, 2 red Christmas bows to add a festive touch, and 1 metal hanger for easy installation. 

Crafted from high-quality PE synthetic fir, these wreaths are designed to last for years to come. The warm yellow LED lights create a cozy and inviting atmosphere, perfect for the holiday season. And with battery power, you can place them anywhere without the hassle of cords or outlets.

The garlands measure 106 inches in length with a diameter of 10 inches and feature a whopping 315 branch tips for a lush and full look. The Christmas wreath has a diameter of 17.72 inches, making it the perfect size to hang on your front door or fireplace. The red bows measure 23.6 x 13.8 inches, adding a touch of elegance to any setting.

These wreaths and garlands are not just limited to your front door or fireplace. They can be used to decorate your Christmas tree, mantel, porch, cabinets, and shelves. The possibilities are endless!

Ideal for homes, shops, hotels, and living rooms, these wreaths are guaranteed to impress your guests and create a festive atmosphere. They are also perfect for Christmas parties and celebrations.

Don't miss out on this incredible set. Order your Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths today and make this holiday season truly magical!
